Service Details: - Offers diversified chiropractic treatment including both firm and gentle methods- Uses manual trigger point therapy, followed by traditional spinal/extremity adjustments- Adjunctive therapies include myofascial release, low volt electrotherapy and impulse adjusting using the Arthrostim (aka Accustim) device- Also offers nutritional and exercise counselling upon request, massage therapy by registered therapists- On-site x-ray services are available
